name: Invertrovert
description:
Jump in and compete against your friends and family to be the ruler of the board!

Game made for Godot Wild Jam 39 | Theme: Inversion

Goal:
Control your cube to invert the board to your color, showing your supreme rule of the land!

- Invert empty squares to score 1 point 

- Invert other players squares to score 2 points 

- Form large rectangles to convert all other colors internally 

- You are a slime

- You can jump around the place using your desired controls. 

- You earn points by inverting control of squares to be yours:

  - 1 point for empty

  - 2 points for other players

- To maximize your points, form a box to surround squares you want to invert. This will cause them to all invert at once.

- Collect power ups to help you take over the area faster, but beware!

Controls:

- Keyboard 1 (rebindable in settings): up/down/left/right

- Keyboard 2 (rebindable in settings):  WASD

- Controller (supports up to 4): Directional buttons

- Touch/Mouse: Swipe in the direction you want to travel

Known bugs: 
- Audio can be really loud at start of game and not able to be controlled in settings. Check if settings updates volume, or restart to fix. 

- Sometimes the player or AI will stop completely after getting the speed power up. A restart is required to fix.
